body.description: A refreshing, cleansing experience for your intimate area so you can take on anything. Summer's Eve Refreshing feminine care products comes in a variety of indulgent SafeScents letting you experience that unique, everyday Summer’s Eve readiness. Summer's Eve Feminine Body Wash is created for your most intimate areas to gently cleanse away the bacteria that can cause odor. Uniquely formulated and pH-balanced to match your body's natural chemistry. All Summer's Eve feminine hygiene products, along with every unique scent, are gynecologist tested to ensure they are safe, even for sensitive skin. Golden Glamour indulgent SafeScent is inspired by peach, mango, warm vanilla, and a touch of jasmine and gentle enough for your most delicate skin. That’s why millions of women trust our expansive range of gynecologist-tested cleansing and care. Our wide variety of products are made for everybody – whether you’re at home or on the go, want to bask in fragrant lusciousness or no scent at all or want ultra-Refreshing or high performance. With every Summer’s Eve product you use, know that We See You, We Get You, We Got You. Sunburn Alert: This product contains an alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Use a sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterwards.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 SafeScents 2 Odor-Causing Bacteria 3 Gynecologist Tested 4 pH-Balanced 5 Free From Dyes & Parabens

Summer's Eve Refresh Neutralizes Odor pH-balanced Gently Cleanses Absorbs Moisture Free from Parabens Tested SafeScents Neutralizes Odor pH-balanced Gently Cleanses Absorbs Moisture Free from Parabens Tested SafeScents

What do you mean by "Safe Scents"? We want to provide you with safe, best smelling products for your intimate care routine. All of our scented cosmetic products are clinically tested by gynecologists to ensure that they are safe, even for those of us with sensitive skin. What's the Refresh Collection? Our Refresh Collection is for those who love to bask in luscious fragrances. It has has an extensive range of fragrance levels, from a light, barely-there fragrance or a bold fragrance that gives you a long-lasting boost of freshness Why does pH matter? It's important to your body’s natural defense and maintaining a good environment for a healthy external vaginal area. The pH of ordinary soap, can be very basic (high pH) and may not complement the natural pH range of your external vaginal area. Isn’t Summer’s Eve and Fem Care just if you have a problem? I don’t have an issue “down there” … The external vaginal area is different than other parts of your body – its delicate, and has a different pH than other areas of the body – and so it needs a different kind of care. What can I do if I experience vaginal itching? If you are experiencing vaginal itching, we recommend you talk with your doctor or healthcare professional about your symptoms. If you know that you have a yeast infection, you can find relief with one of our Monistat products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great wash. Suds up good. Only need a nickel size. I am very sensitive and this did not cause any problems.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Peaches and Mangos Scent in Private Parts!
reviews.reviewText: This is the best fragrance that Summers Eve has. Its fruity and smells like Mango and Peaches. Who can say no? I use all of the products. I shower with this and it cleans me and removes all bad smell from privates for at least 2 days. I also use the golden glamour wipes for refreshing after using the restroom I use for vagina and my behind too before I finish, and also the spray for my vulva area hold it at least 8 inches away and spray vulva and panties. You will never feel self conscious or not confident again. You will feel like you can do anything. Hygiene for women is very important to their self image.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It has a very good smell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This leaves me feeling so fresh. The smell is amazing.

I have used this product for over a month now and I love it. It does not cause irritation and leaves me feeling fresh all day. A lot of people did not like the scent of this product, but I disagree.. the scent is very light and smells wonderful. Also, a little bit goes a long way!! I would definitely re-purchase this.

reviews.reviewText: i bought this feminine wash i psid £30 just this product and the delivery the delivery was late for a week! opened the product it was used it smelt BADD! i wasted my money on this now i dont know what to do?
